notes.text:
An update is available for Judy, asio, mariadb, galera.
This update affects Rocky Linux 8.
A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE list
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
MariaDB is a multi-user, multi-threaded SQL database server that is binary compatible with MySQL. 

The following packages have been upgraded to a later upstream version: mariadb (10.3.28), galera (25.3.32).

Security Fix(es):

* mariadb: writable system variables allows a database user with SUPER privilege to execute arbitrary code as the system mysql user (CVE-2021-27928)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

This advisory is provided by Ctrl IQ, Inc for Rocky Linux systems. For more information about CIQ security practices, visit https://ciq.com/security.
notes.title: Description

references.summary: Red Hat CSAF document for RHSA-2021:1242

document.title: Important: mariadb:10.3 and mariadb-devel:10.3 security update
